subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Maxime Talbot, who was a folk hero in Pittsburgh before his two goals in Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals, got a rousing welcome in his first game of the season on Wednesday night.
snippet: Maxime Talbot, who was a folk hero in Pittsburgh before his two goals in Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals, got a rousing welcome in his first game of the season on Wednesday night.
